A sermon of sanctification preached on the Act Sunday at Oxford, Iulie 12, 1607. By Richard Crakanthorp Doctor of Diuinity. Crakanthorpe, Richard, 1567-1624.
[4], 36 p.
Printed [at Eliot's Court Press] for Tho. Adams, London : 1608.
On 1 Thessalonians V, 23. Identification of printer from STC. Reproduction of the original in Durham University Library.
